name: Experimental Gameplay #2 - Earthy
description:
This game consists of an experimental prototype for a short game. There is only one level in this game.

Goal: Dig your way to the 3 gold hexagons.

Controls:

* Use your mouse to move your digging implement.

* Press R to restart the game.

* Press Escape to quit the game.

This game was made for a class at the University of Utah known as "Experimental Gameplay", which challenges students to make short games with unique mechanics using a gamejam-like format. The prompt for this game was "Earthy". I decided to make the game about digging through dirt, while representing that dirt as a physically simulated group of objects.
